category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: PSM_classic_variants_date_families
preference.preference_description:
Manually controls variant option value mode detection for select variant option families in configurators "Teamcenter Classic Variant" or "Teamcenter Classic Effectivity". By default, a classic option family is recognized as a date family if all values are formatted as a date (as specified by ISO-8601). A value is considered to be formatted as a date if it matches the following pattern: dddd [{-}] dd [{-}] dd T dd [{:}] dd [{:}] ddZ, where d stands for a digit (e.g. "1975-04-28T02:20:00Z").
This is a site preference.
